title: Infrastructure as a Dataset: How Visual AI Is Reshaping Utility Inspections
description: A recent DTECH webinar examined how utilities are using drone imagery, computer vision and machine learning to move beyond manual inspections and close long-standing asset data gaps.
content: A recent DTECH webinar examined how utilities are using drone imagery, computer vision and machine learning to move beyond manual inspections and close long-standing asset data gaps.
